info.title: TigerConnect Roster API
info.description: The roster system for TigerConnect messaging platform.

get.summary: Get the recent conversation list for a user. As new messages are sent and received, the roster is updated with those conversations.
get.description: Get the recent conversation list for a user. As new messages are sent and received, the roster is updated with those conversations.

200.description: With a JSON body as shown

delete.summary: Remove a conversation from the recent conversation list.
delete.description: Remove a conversation from the recent conversation list. For conversations that are with another User, all messages are deleted. For conversations with a group, the User leaves the group and is no longer receives subsequent group messages.

parameters.name: TT-X-Organization-Key
parameters.description: The organization with which the entity is associated in the roster. Defaults to the TigerText Consumer organization

200.description: With a JSON body as shown

204.description: The user or group was correctly removed from the roster.

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

403.description: If the user is not a member of the provided organization

404.description: If the provided organization does not exist
